summary: A small suite of tools for use in the Paint.Net image editor for creating High Quality normal maps.
descriptionHtml:
The Normal Tools allows users to create high quality N_maps with full control of specularity, reflectiveness and of course, normal angle.  The normal tools also has the ability to create N_maps incorporating inverted normals, if you so choose.  This tool set creates normal maps which are fully compatible with Skyrim, Oblivion and the Fallout series.  Links, both active and cut and paste, to all required software is included with this download.  Also included is an extensive 27 page manual with a step by step tutorial incorporating 75 images and screen shots.  I truly believe that this tool set is superior to the Gimp normal mapper, and I know that it FAR surpasses my previous normal mapper for Paint.Net.

Requires:
    Paint.Net
    A computer
author: Goujosamma
